Package chav1961.purelib.ui

This package contains a set of classes to use in the UI-oriented applications.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UIUtils.CreateFieldCallback<FieldType>
    Interface to create field for the UIUtils.collectFields(Localizer, Class, Object, List, CreateLabelCallback, CreateFieldCallback) method call.
    UIUtils.CreateLabelCallback<LabelType>
    Interface to create label for the UIUtils.collectFields(Localizer, Class, Object, List, CreateLabelCallback, CreateFieldCallback) method call.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractInMemoryFormModel<Id,Instance>  
    AbstractLowLevelFormFactory<Id,Instance>
    This class is a template for the low-level form factories.
    AbstractLowLevelFormFactory.FieldDescriptor  
    AbstractLowLevelFormFactory.FormPage  
    AbstractWizardStep<Common,ErrorType extends Enum<?>,Content>
    This class is a template for the wizard steps and implements it's typical functionality.
    ContentModelFactory  
    FormFieldFormat
    This class is used in conjuntion with the AbstractLowLevelFormFactory class to describe low lever for field formats.
    LabelAndField<LabelType,FieldType>  
    MutableContentNodeMetadata  
    SimpleContentMetadata  
    TrivialRecommendations  
    UIUtils
    This is utility class to support useful methods for UI.

Package chav1961.purelib.ui Description

This package contains a set of classes to use in the UI-oriented applications.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
